text:
It’s time to celebrate! Jessica Alba and her husband, Cash Warren, have welcomed their third child together, Us Weekly can confirm.

Celebrity Babies of 2017

Alba posted a pic of her newborn on Instagram on Monday, January 1, writing, “Hayes Alba Warren 12/31/17 Best gift to ring in the New Year!! Cash and I feel so blessed. Haven and Honor are already obsessed with their new baby bro.”

Proud papa Warren also shared a pic that showed him cradling his son. “Hayes Alba Warren: You sure know how to ring in the new year!” he captioned the photo. “You showed up a few days early but we couldn’t be any happier. Your Mamma is the strongest woman I know … you’re so lucky to have her by your side. You have two amazing sisters who already adore you and I know you’ll be thankful to have them guide the way. On your first day of life, I promise to love you, to cherish you, and to provide you with a sandbox full of dreams to explore. Welcome to the family my sweet baby Hayes!”

The 36-year-old Honest Company co-founder announced she was expecting her third bundle of joy via Instagram in July. In the playful Boomerang, Alba cradled her growing baby bump and held a balloon with the number 3 alongside daughters Honor, 9, and Haven, 6.

And since sharing her happy news, the Sin City actress has not been shy about showing off her pregnancy curves.

Famous Celebrity Pregnancies:

In August, the brunette beauty had her growing baby bump on full display while wearing a gray dress as she posed for an Instagram snap with a friend.

“Love being preggers w my baby boo #BossLady @jkroogr,” the star wrote of the sweet moment.

In September, the on-the-go-mom showed no signs of slowing down as she shared a pic of her belly while waiting for a flight.

“#bumpattheairport,” she captioned the photo.

#bumpattheairport A post shared by Jessica Alba (@jessicaalba) on Sep 10, 2017 at 11:04am PDT

Later that month, the business mogul was able to squeeze in a little R&R, posting a Boomerang video of her bump while soaking up some sun and fresh air at the beach. She captioned the escape: “#friyay.”

#friyay A post shared by Jessica Alba (@jessicaalba) on Sep 29, 2017 at 10:28am PDT

And shortly before giving birth, the California native wished her mother, Catherine Jensen, a happy birthday in a sweet Instagram post that showed her mom resting her hands on Alba’s tummy.

“#happybirthday to my beautiful mom @cathyalba 🎂😚💖,” Alba captioned the precious moment.

The Baby, Baby, Baby actress opened up to Us Weekly in November 2016 about prioritizing time with her daughters — even when she’s traveling for work.

Cutest Celebrity Baby Announcements

“I go on so many business trips, and they’re usually two or three days. I’ll bring just one at a time and it’ll be like, ‘Mom’s gonna bring you on a special trip,’” she told Us. “We’ll get to have a sleepover, we’ll get to order room service, we’ll get to rent a movie. It’s really fun!”

Alba and Warren, who met on set of 2005’s Fantastic Four, dated for three years before tying the knot in 2008.
title: Jessica Alba Gives Birth, Welcomes Third Child With Cash Warren: Photos
